name: TurnTack
description: Monsters destroyed all of the human world. Half-blood girl who is the player in the game goes back to the world that it's yet destroyed. She tries to keep the human world safe but the monsters have been suffering likewise. Therefore she is confused what's right to do because of her half-blood identity.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Window7 64-bit Processor: intel CPU Core i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 460 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 10 GB available space Additional Notes: SSE4.2 Required
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Window7 64-bit Processor: intel CPU Core i7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 660 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 10 GB available space Additional Notes: SSE4.2 Required
